definitions: (with reference to food) the state of being recently made or obtained or not having decayed

examples.text: the restaurant's selling point is the freshness of its ingredients

shortDefinitions: state of being recently made or obtained

definitions: the quality of being pleasantly new or different

examples.text: he brings freshness to a familiar story
the commentary should display freshness of insight

shortDefinitions: quality of being pleasantly new or different

definitions: the state of being recently created or experienced and not faded or impaired
shortDefinitions: state of being recently created or experienced and not faded or impaired

definitions: the quality of being attractively youthful and unspoiled

examples.text: he has the enthusiasm and freshness of youth

shortDefinitions: quality of being attractively youthful and unspoilt

examples.text: his freshness, passion, and focus got him cast in leading roles

definitions: brightness or healthiness of complexion or appearance

examples.text: she has retained the freshness of face that was there at her debut
the frescoes still retain their freshness and color

definitions: (with reference to wind) the quality of being cool and fairly strong

examples.text: the freshness of the wind with its cooling air

shortDefinitions: quality of being cool and fairly strong

definitions: the quality of being pleasantly clean and cool
shortDefinitions: quality of being pleasantly clean and cool
